name: Lumenari
description:
You find yourself in an abandoned mine shaft, what will you do?
Find a way back to your friend and escape the old dangerous mine.

Stripped of all your equipment, exploring the caves to find resources is essential so curiosity will be rewarded. Collect Lux Lapis to unlock checkpoints and be aware of breakable walls which provide loot and occasionally even shortcuts for faster navigation. Be cautious, or you will not survive.

Controls

A - D / Left Stick  -  Move

W / South Button  -  Jump

Arrow Up/Down / Left Stick  -  Look Up/Down

Spacebar / Right Trigger  -  Use Pickaxe

Shift / Left Stick Press  -  Sprint

Story

One day, Magnus was ordered to investigate an area that was at risk at caving in to see, whether the structure of the abandoned shaft can be stabilized or not. During his investigation, the floor of the shaft gave in and he falls down a steep slope down into the darkness. Once Magnus regained consciousness, he finds himself trapped in a deeper level, completely isolated from the other workers. The only hope of getting back home is through the uncharted mineshafts and crossroads that were laying dormant for centuries.

Installation

1. Unzip the file
2. Open the .exe file
3. Enjoy
